name: Dream3D
headline: Generative AI Worlds
description: Dream3D builds generative models to simulate and emulate worlds, real and imagined.

founders.name: Tony Francis, Founder
founders.description: Tony is a two-time YC founder. His previous company, Inokyo (YC S18), built the first AI-checkout retail stores. Later he lead the development of the ML platform at Clubhouse. Currently, he is the founder & CEO of Dream3D (W23), building generative models to simulate virtual worlds.

## Dream3D
Dream3D is a team of researchers and designers building a new category of AI foundation models for visual software.
We work out of our office in Brooklyn, NY. If you have a particularly strong background in research or engineering, we'd love to hear from you.
You can see our current openings [here](https://dream3d.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/dream3d/jobs>).

generated_description:
### Dream3D: Crafting Generative AI Worlds

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2023 batch, Dream3D is a bold venture based in Brooklyn, New York. With a compact yet passionate team of three, they're dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what generative AI can achieve. The core mission? To build generative models that simulate and emulate both real and imagined worlds.

At Dream3D, the focus is on developing a new category of AI foundation models tailored for visual software. It’s an ambitious goal, but hey, this is the age of AI—remarkable possibilities lie ahead.

Dalton Caldwell serves as the Group Partner, bringing guidance and insight to the fledgling company. Dream3D is tagged in the emergent realms of generative AI, computer vision, and artificial intelligence, making it a company to watch in the rapidly evolving tech landscape.

If you’re intrigued and think you’ve got something to contribute, they’re on the lookout for talented individuals in research and engineering. Check out their career opportunities [here](https://dream3d.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/dream3d/jobs>).

For more on their journey and innovations, visit their [website](https://dream3d.com).
